column1: #  FILENAME -            Name of a log file that should exist in both test & replay area. If file is missing in one of the areas
#  SKIP_DIFF -           Only ensure the existance of the log file. Do not perform any diff. Default is 'false'
#  MISMATCH_RATIO -      A real number between 0 and 1. Default is 0
#  IGNORE_COLUMNS -      Column-indexes to filter out of the logs
column2: separated by semycolon (;). Column indexes counting is starting from 1! Default is none

column1: #  IGNORE_EXTRA_LINES -  If the original file (test-file) is longer than the replay-file
column2: ignore lines that are in a higher index than the length of the replay-file. Default is 'false'

column1: #  SORT_BEFORE_DIFF -    Sort lines alphabetically (Done after filtering columns and before removing extra-lines and grepping). Default is false

column2: to filter lines due to it. Default is no grepping at all
to filter lines due to its inverse pattern. Default is no grepping at all
